languages.text: "Склонил к сотрудничеству". {n}Хейнрикс наклоняет голову и, хрустнув шеей, морщится.{/n} "Я способен влиять на живые тела. И нахожу, что дознаваемые куда охотнее делятся информацией, когда их кровь начинает закипать в жилах".

traits.locale_text: "Склонил к сотрудничеству". {n}Хейнрикс наклоняет голову и, хрустнув шеей, морщится.{/n} "Я способен влиять на живые тела. И нахожу, что дознаваемые куда охотнее делятся информацией, когда их кровь начинает закипать в жилах".

languages.text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."
languages.original_text: "Склонил к сотрудничеству". {n}Хейнрикс наклоняет голову и, хрустнув шеей, морщится.{/n} "Я способен влиять на живые тела. И нахожу, что дознаваемые куда охотнее делятся информацией, когда их кровь начинает закипать в жилах".

traits.locale_text: "Convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once blood starts to boil in their veins."

"I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

languages.text: “我说服了他与我合作。”{n}海因里希低下头，转了转脖子，皱了皱眉。{/n}“我可以影响活物，而且我发现，当被审讯者的血液开始沸腾时，他们会更加乐于招供。”
languages.original_text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

traits.locale_text: “我说服了他与我合作。”{n}海因里希低下头，转了转脖子，皱了皱眉。{/n}“我可以影响活物，而且我发现，当被审讯者的血液开始沸腾时，他们会更加乐于招供。”

languages.text: 「彼を説得して協力させたのだ」{n}ハインリックスはその男の頭を下げ、首を割き、表情を歪めた。{/n}「私は生身の肉体に影響を与えることができる。そして、尋問を受けた側は血が沸騰し始めるにつれ、より熱心に情報を告げてくれるようになるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

traits.locale_text: 「彼を説得して協力させたのだ」{n}ハインリックスはその男の頭を下げ、首を割き、表情を歪めた。{/n}「私は生身の肉体に影響を与えることができる。そして、尋問を受けた側は血が沸騰し始めるにつれ、より熱心に情報を告げてくれるようになるのだ」

languages.text: "Ich habe ihn zur Kooperation überredet." {n}Heinrix senkt den Kopf, lässt seinen Hals knacken und verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich kann lebende Körper beeinflussen. Und die Verhörten teilen ihre Informationen viel schneller mit mir, wenn sie spüren, wie das Blut in ihren Adern kocht."
languages.original_text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ihn zur Kooperation überredet." {n}Heinrix senkt den Kopf, lässt seinen Hals knacken und verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich kann lebende Körper beeinflussen. Und die Verhörten teilen ihre Informationen viel schneller mit mir, wenn sie spüren, wie das Blut in ihren Adern kocht."

languages.text: « Je l'ai convaincu de coopérer. » {n}Heinrix hoche la tête, fait craquer sa nuque et grimace.{/n} « Je peux affecter les organismes vivants. Or, il se trouve qu'une personne dont le sang commence à bouillir dans ses veines est bien plus encline à partager des informations. »
languages.original_text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ai convaincu de coopérer. » {n}Heinrix hoche la tête, fait craquer sa nuque et grimace.{/n} « Je peux affecter les organismes vivants. Or, il se trouve qu'une personne dont le sang commence à bouillir dans ses veines est bien plus encline à partager des informations. »

languages.text: «Le he convencido para que coopere». {n}Heinrix inclina la cabeza, se cruje el cuello y hace una mueca.{/n} «Puedo influir a los cuerpos vivos, y descubrí hace tiempo que los interrogados están mucho más dispuestos a compartir su información cuando les empieza a hervir la sangre en las venas».
languages.original_text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

traits.locale_text: «Le he convencido para que coopere». {n}Heinrix inclina la cabeza, se cruje el cuello y hace una mueca.{/n} «Puedo influir a los cuerpos vivos, y descubrí hace tiempo que los interrogados están mucho más dispuestos a compartir su información cuando les empieza a hervir la sangre en las venas».

languages.original_text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

languages.text: "İş birliği yapmaya razı ettim." {n}Heinrix başını eğiyor, boynunu kıtırdatıp yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Canlı bedenlerde etkim büyüktür. Sorguladıklarım, damarlarındaki kan kaynamaya başladığında bilgi paylaşmaya çok daha yatkın olur."
languages.original_text: "I convinced him to cooperate." {n}Heinrix bows his head, cracks his neck, and grimaces.{/n} "I can influence living bodies. And I find that the interrogated are much more eager to share information once the blood starts to boil in their veins."

traits.locale_text: "İş birliği yapmaya razı ettim." {n}Heinrix başını eğiyor, boynunu kıtırdatıp yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Canlı bedenlerde etkim büyüktür. Sorguladıklarım, damarlarındaki kan kaynamaya başladığında bilgi paylaşmaya çok daha yatkın olur."
